definition: temple to Confucius in his hometown Qufu
the Confucius family mausoleum at Qufu 曲阜, rebuilt and extended by every dynasty
Qufu county level city in Jining 濟寧|济宁[Ji3 ning2], Shandong/hometown of Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3]
Dai Temple, a temple in Shandong for the god of Mount Tai
Longmen Grottoes at Luoyang 洛陽|洛阳[Luo4 yang2], Henan
the official residence of Confucius' descendants at Qufu 曲阜, Shandong
model teacher of every age (idiom)/eternal paragon/refers to Confucius (551-479 BC) 孔子[Kong3 zi3]
Mukden Palace, aka Shenyang Imperial Palace, the main imperial palace during the early years of the Qing dynasty (1625-1644), a secondary palace in subsequent years, now a museum
the Ming tombs (mausoleum park of the Ming emperors in Changping district of Beijing)

the four great caves, namely: Longmen Grottoes 龍門石窟|龙门石窟[Long2 men2 Shi2 ku1] at Luoyang, Henan, Yungang Caves 雲岡石窟|云冈石窟[Yun2 gang1 Shi2 ku1] at Datong, Shanxi, Mogao Caves 莫高窟[Mo4 gao1 ku1] at Dunhuang, Gansu, and Mt Maiji Caves 麥積山石窟|麦积山石窟[Mai4 ji1 Shan1 Shi2 ku1] at Tianshui, Gansu
Yinxu, ruins of Yinshang 殷商 city at Anyang 安陽|安阳 in Henan province, a World Heritage site
Yuelu Academy in Changsha, Hunan, famous ancient academy
